Super fast work! Similar question to the previous PR on readability, is there a way to represent this:

```

historical_block_hashes: Annotated[
    list[Bytes32],
    Field(max_length=DEVNET_CONFIG.historical_roots_limit),
]
```


closer to this?

```

historical_block_hashes: List[Bytes32, DEVNET_CONFIG.historical_roots_limit]```
